# Security Policy

### Supported Versions

This section outlines the versions of the project that are actively maintained and receive security updates.

---
| Version | Supported          |
| ------- | ------------------ |
| 2026.x.x   | :white_check_mark: |
---

### Reporting a Vulnerability

If you find a security vulnerability in this project, please report it by opening an issue on the projectâ€™s issue tracker.
